meta.description: Disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in /*global */ comments

content.introduction:
Disallow the use of undeclared variables unless mentioned in/*global */comments
âœ…RecommendedUsing therecommendedconfig from@eslint/jsin aconfiguration fileenables this rule
Table of ContentsRule DetailsOptionstypeofWhen Not To Use ItCompatibilityHandled by TypeScriptRelated RulesVersionResources
This rule can help you locate potential ReferenceErrors resulting from misspellings of variable and parameter names, or accidental implicit globals (for example, from forgetting thevarkeyword in aforloop initializer).
content.sub_configuration_introduction:
typeofset to true will warn for variables used inside typeof check (Default false).
Examples ofcorrectcode for the default{ "typeof": false }option:
You can use this option if you want to preventtypeofcheck on a variable which has not been declared.
